main event: A witness saw a bright light move rapidly across the sky from the NE to SW around 11:45 p.m. EDT, then stop abruptly and disappear straight up.
interesting points: The object appeared like a brilliant star and was observed moving behind trees,The length of the observation is noted as 3 years minimum,The weather conditions were noted as clear with no clouds,Only one object was reported,The witness was parked in a car when the sighting occurred.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: the witness was sitting in a car
